data.content:
Dr. Mundo (Mr. Mundoverse)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2010

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his eccentric personality and his unorthodox methods of healing. With his wild experiments and questionable sanity, it's no surprise that he has a skin that reflects his unique character. Mr. Mundoverse is a skin that takes Dr. Mundo's madness to a whole new level, transforming him into a dapper gentleman ready to conquer the Rift.

Released on November 29, 2010, Mr. Mundoverse quickly became a fan favorite among Dr. Mundo enthusiasts. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a complete visual overhaul for the champion, giving players a fresh and stylish look for their favorite mad doctor.

Mr. Mundoverse outfits Dr. Mundo in a sharp, tailored suit, complete with a top hat and a monocle. The once disheveled and deranged doctor now exudes an air of sophistication and class. His lab coat is replaced with a sleek black suit, and his cleaver is transformed into a polished cane, perfect for a gentleman of his stature. The skin also features new animations and particle effects, adding an extra layer of elegance to Dr. Mundo's abilities.

One of the standout features of Mr. Mundoverse is the attention to detail in the skin's design. From the intricate patterns on his suit to the subtle animations that bring the character to life, every aspect of the skin has been carefully crafted to create a visually stunning experience. The skin truly captures the essence of a refined gentleman, while still maintaining the essence of Dr. Mundo's craziness.

Now, let's delve into the story of Dr. Mundo himself. In the world of League of Legends, Dr. Mundo is a Zaunite scientist who became obsessed with the idea of perfecting the human body. His experiments led him down a dark path, transforming him into the deranged and unpredictable character we know today. Driven by his insatiable curiosity, he constantly seeks new subjects to experiment on, often using himself as a test subject.

Dr. Mundo's abilities in the game reflect his chaotic nature. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a portion of his maximum health over time, making him incredibly difficult to kill. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, hurls a cleaver at his enemies, dealing damage and slowing them down. His W ability, Burning Agony, sets himself on fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies and reducing the duration of crowd control effects. His E ability, Masochism, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage based on his missing health. Finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, increases his movement speed and health regeneration for a short duration, allowing him to sustain through fights and escape dangerous situations.

In the game, Dr. Mundo is primarily played as a tanky bruiser in the top lane or jungle. His high sustain and durability make him a formidable opponent, capable of soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. However, his lack of crowd control and reliance on health as a resource can make him vulnerable to champions with burst damage or healing reduction abilities.

Dr. Mundo has been a staple in the League of Legends roster since his release in 2009. His unique character design and playstyle have made him a favorite among players who enjoy a more unconventional approach to the game. Whether you're a fan of his mad scientist persona or his gentlemanly alter ego, Mr. Mundoverse, Dr. Mundo offers a truly unique and entertaining experience on the Rift.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Dr. Mundo's appearances, including his base skin and other available skins. Explore the different facets of this eccentric champion and discover the madness that lies within!

Dr. Mundo: The Madman of Zaun

Release Date: February 2, 2009

Dr. Mundo, also known as the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. With his unique and eccentric personality, Dr. Mundo has become a fan-favorite among players. In this article, we will delve into the story behind this enigmatic character, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and discuss his role in the game.

The Story of Dr. Mundo

Dr. Mundo's origins lie in the city of Zaun, a place known for its dark and twisted experiments. Once a brilliant chemist, Dr. Mundo's obsession with unlocking the secrets of immortality led him down a path of madness. He subjected himself to countless experiments, injecting himself with dangerous concoctions and performing gruesome surgeries on his own body.

As a result of his self-inflicted experiments, Dr. Mundo's mind and body were forever altered. He became an unstoppable force, possessing superhuman strength and an insatiable desire for destruction. His sanity deteriorated, and he embraced his new identity as the Madman of Zaun.

Now, Dr. Mundo roams the streets of Zaun, wreaking havoc wherever he goes. His deranged laughter echoes through the alleyways as he searches for new victims to experiment on. He is a terrifying figure, feared by both the innocent and the guilty.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Dr. Mundo is a tanky champion, excelling in soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a percentage of his maximum health over time, making him incredibly difficult to kill. This regeneration is further enhanced by his ultimate ability, Sadism, which instantly restores a large portion of his health and increases his movement speed.

One of Dr. Mundo's greatest strengths is his ability to dive into the enemy team and disrupt their formation. His Infected Cleaver ability throws a cleaver at a target, dealing damage and slowing them down. This allows Dr. Mundo to close the gap and engage in close combat. His Burning Agony ability creates a persistent area of effect damage around him, dealing damage to nearby enemies and reducing their crowd control effects.

However, Dr. Mundo does have weaknesses that can be exploited by skilled opponents. His lack of crowd control abilities makes him vulnerable to champions who can kite him or lock him down. Additionally, his reliance on health regeneration means that champions who can apply healing reduction effects can significantly reduce his survivability.

Dr. Mundo in the Game

In League of Legends, Dr. Mundo is primarily played in the top lane or jungle role. His tankiness and sustain make him a formidable laner, capable of surviving even the toughest matchups. He can also clear jungle camps quickly and efficiently, making him a popular choice for jungle players.

Dr. Mundo's playstyle revolves around being a disruptive force in team fights. With his high health pool and regeneration, he can soak up damage while his teammates deal damage to the enemy team. His Masochism ability empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage based on his missing health, making him a threat even in the late game.

Furthermore, Dr. Mundo's unique personality and appearance have made him a popular choice for players looking to stand out. His eccentric quotes and maniacal laughter add a touch of humor to the game, making him a joy to play and watch.

Explore Dr. Mundo's Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Dr. Mundo's skins. From the classic Toxic Dr. Mundo to the whimsical Corporate Mundo, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the traditional look or want to explore the more outlandish options, our website has you covered.

Dr. Mundo is a champion that embodies chaos and madness. With his insane experiments and unyielding determination, he has carved a place for himself in the League of Legends universe. Whether you choose to play him for his tankiness, his disruptive abilities, or simply for the sheer enjoyment of his character, Dr. Mundo is a champion that will leave a lasting impression.

Dr. Mundo (Default)

Cost: N/A | Release Date: N/A

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his insane personality and unbreakable will, Dr. Mundo has become a fan-favorite character in the game. In this article, we will delve into the story behind Dr. Mundo's default skin and explore all the details of this iconic costume.

The Story of Dr. Mundo's Default Skin

Dr. Mundo's default skin represents his original appearance in the game. He is depicted as a hulking, shirtless brute with green skin and wild, unkempt hair. His body is covered in scars and stitches, a testament to his self-inflicted experiments and disregard for pain.

The default skin perfectly captures Dr. Mundo's deranged nature and his obsession with self-mutilation. It showcases his twisted sense of humor and his complete lack of regard for societal norms. With his signature cleaver in hand, Dr. Mundo is ready to wreak havoc on the Fields of Justice.

While the default skin may not have any additional visual effects or animations, it remains a classic choice for players who appreciate the raw and unfiltered essence of Dr. Mundo's character.

The Story of Dr. Mundo

Dr. Mundo's story in League of Legends is as bizarre as the champion himself. Born in the underbelly of Zaun, a city known for its dark and dangerous experiments, Dr. Mundo was once a brilliant scientist. However, his insatiable curiosity and thirst for knowledge led him down a path of madness.

Driven by his desire to understand pain and suffering, Dr. Mundo began conducting twisted experiments on himself. He subjected his body to unimaginable tortures, injecting himself with various chemicals and performing gruesome surgeries. The result was a complete loss of sanity and a transformation into the monstrous being he is today.

Now known as the Madman of Zaun, Dr. Mundo roams the streets, inflicting pain on himself and others with reckless abandon. He believes that pain is the ultimate truth and seeks to spread his deranged philosophy to the world.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Dr. Mundo is a tanky champion with incredible sustain and durability. His ultimate ability, Sadism, allows him to rapidly regenerate health, making him difficult to kill. Additionally, his Burning Agony ability deals damage to nearby enemies and reduces crowd control effects, further enhancing his survivability.

However, Dr. Mundo lacks crowd control abilities and relies heavily on his basic attacks and cleaver throws to deal damage. He can be kited by champions with high mobility or crowd control abilities, making it challenging for him to reach his targets.

Despite his weaknesses, Dr. Mundo excels in prolonged team fights and is a formidable frontliner. His ability to soak up damage and disrupt the enemy team makes him a valuable asset in team compositions that prioritize sustained engagements.

Dr. Mundo's Place in the Game

Dr. Mundo has been a staple pick in the top lane for many years. His ability to sustain through the laning phase and become an unkillable tank in the late game makes him a popular choice for players who enjoy a more defensive playstyle.

Additionally, Dr. Mundo's unique character design and quirky personality have endeared him to the League of Legends community. He has become an iconic champion, often associated with the absurd and unpredictable nature of the game.

Explore Dr. Mundo's Appearances

On this page, you can find information and videos about all of Dr. Mundo's appearances in League of Legends. From his default skin to his various alternate skins, you can witness the evolution of this madman and discover the different facets of his character.

Whether you prefer the classic and raw aesthetic of his default skin or the more extravagant and thematic designs of his alternate skins, Dr. Mundo offers a unique and entertaining gameplay experience.

Dr. Mundo (Executioner Mundo)

Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2010

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his insane experiments and brutal methods. With his new skin, Executioner Mundo, he takes his sadistic nature to a whole new level. This skin transforms Dr. Mundo into a terrifying executioner, ready to deliver punishment to his enemies.

Executioner Mundo features a complete visual overhaul for the champion. Dr. Mundo's usual lab coat is replaced with a dark, tattered robe, adorned with bloodstains and chains. His head is covered with a menacing hood, hiding his face in shadows. The skin also introduces new animations and effects, enhancing the overall theme of an executioner.

One of the most striking aspects of Executioner Mundo is his weapon. Instead of his usual cleaver, he wields a massive, blood-soaked axe. The axe is intricately designed, with sharp edges and a wickedly curved blade. Every swing of this weapon sends shivers down the spines of his enemies.

The abilities of Dr. Mundo also receive a makeover with this skin. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, now hurls a blood-soaked axe at his foes, leaving a trail of blood in its wake. His W ability, Burning Agony, engulfs him in a dark, fiery aura, intensifying the menacing presence of Executioner Mundo. Even his ultimate ability, Sadism, is enhanced with this skin, as Dr. Mundo's body becomes engulfed in dark energy, symbolizing his insatiable thirst for blood.

Dr. Mundo, the champion behind Executioner Mundo, has a fascinating story within the League of Legends universe. He was once a brilliant doctor in Zaun, but his obsession with finding a cure for all ailments led him down a dark path. Experimenting on himself with dangerous chemicals and potions, he transformed into the deranged and monstrous being he is today.

Despite his madness, Dr. Mundo possesses incredible strength and resilience. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a portion of his maximum health over time, making him difficult to kill. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, deals damage based on a percentage of the target's current health, making him a formidable tank against high-health enemies. Additionally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, instantly restores a significant amount of his health, allowing him to sustain through fights and continue wreaking havoc.

However, Dr. Mundo does have weaknesses. He lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to champions who can kite or disable him. Additionally, his abilities cost health to cast, which can leave him vulnerable if not managed properly. Despite these weaknesses, Dr. Mundo's sheer durability and damage output make him a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield.

In the world of League of Legends, Dr. Mundo is often played as a top laner or a jungler. His tankiness and sustain make him a great choice for soaking up damage and initiating fights. With his high base damage and health-scaling abilities, he can also dish out significant damage to squishy targets. Dr. Mundo's versatility allows him to fit into various team compositions, making him a popular pick among players.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Dr. Mundo, including his Executioner Mundo skin. Explore the terrifying world of the Madman of Zaun and unleash chaos on the Rift with this brutal executioner skin.

Dr. Mundo (Corporate Mundo)

RP Cost: 975 RP | Release Date: November 29, 2010

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his eccentric personality and unconventional methods. With his wild experiments and questionable medical practices, he has become a notorious figure in the League of Legends. However, even the Madman needs to take a break from his chaotic endeavors and embrace the corporate world. This is where the Corporate Mundo skin comes into play.

Released on November 29, 2010, the Corporate Mundo skin offers players a unique and humorous take on the character. Dr. Mundo, known for his ragged appearance and tattered lab coat, transforms into a corporate executive with this skin. He trades in his worn-out clothes for a sleek suit, complete with a tie and shiny shoes. His signature cleaver is replaced with a briefcase, and his iconic cleaver-throwing animation is replaced with him tossing papers instead. This skin truly embodies the concept of business casual.

But the transformation doesn't stop there. Dr. Mundo's abilities also receive a corporate makeover. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, now hurls a briefcase at his enemies, leaving them feeling the weight of corporate bureaucracy. His W ability, Burning Agony, turns him into a walking office party, with confetti and streamers bursting out from his suit. His E ability, Masochism, grants him a temporary boost in productivity, represented by a stack of paperwork piling up on his desk. And finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, allows him to escape from the stresses of the corporate world by transforming into a briefcase and teleporting away.

Now that we've explored the details of the Corporate Mundo skin, let's delve into the story of Dr. Mundo himself. In the world of League of Legends, Dr. Mundo was once a brilliant chemist working in Zaun, a city known for its technological advancements and dark underbelly. Obsessed with unlocking the secrets of immortality, he conducted dangerous experiments on himself, resulting in his transformation into the deranged and seemingly indestructible being we know today.

Dr. Mundo's strength lies in his incredible durability and ability to sustain damage. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a portion of his maximum health over time, making him a formidable tank in team fights. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, not only deals damage but also slows down enemies, making it easier for his team to catch up and secure kills. His W ability, Burning Agony, deals damage to nearby enemies and reduces the duration of crowd control effects, allowing him to shrug off stuns and slows. His E ability, Masochism, empowers his next basic attack with bonus damage based on his missing health, making him a threat even when he's low on health. And finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, instantly restores a large portion of his health and increases his movement speed, allowing him to engage or disengage from fights with ease.

However, Dr. Mundo does have weaknesses. Despite his incredible durability, he lacks hard crowd control abilities, making it difficult for him to lock down enemies or peel for his teammates. Additionally, his damage output is relatively low compared to other champions, especially in the early stages of the game. This means that while he can soak up a lot of damage, he relies on his team to secure kills and deal significant damage.

In the world of League of Legends, Dr. Mundo has found his place as a top laner or jungler. His ability to sustain damage and soak up enemy resources makes him a strong pick in the top lane, where he can bully opponents and become an unkillable force. In the jungle, his fast clear speed and ability to regenerate health make him a viable option for players looking to control objectives and provide utility for their team.

On this page, you can find information and videos about all the appearances of Dr. Mundo, including the Corporate Mundo skin. Whether you're a fan of his mad scientist persona or enjoy the comedic twist of his corporate alter ego, Dr. Mundo offers a unique and entertaining playstyle that is sure to leave a lasting impression on the Rift.

Dr. Mundo (Pool Party Mundo)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: July 29, 2013

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his eccentric personality and unconventional methods. With his Pool Party Mundo skin, he takes a break from his usual chaotic experiments and dives into the fun-filled world of summer parties. This skin transforms Dr. Mundo into a beach-loving, poolside enthusiast, ready to soak up the sun and make a splash on the Rift.

Pool Party Mundo is a vibrant and playful skin that captures the essence of summer. Dr. Mundo trades his traditional lab coat for a colorful Hawaiian shirt, complete with a matching lei. His signature cleaver is replaced with a watermelon slice, and his syringe is now a water gun, ready to drench his enemies in watery chaos. With his flip-flops and swim trunks, Pool Party Mundo is ready to hit the beach and show off his unique style.

Not only does Pool Party Mundo bring a refreshing new look to the Madman of Zaun, but it also adds some exciting visual effects to his abilities. When using his Q ability, Infected Cleaver, Dr. Mundo hurls a giant watermelon slice at his enemies, leaving a splash of water behind. His W ability, Burning Agony, creates a swirling pool of water around him, and his E ability, Masochism, grants him a temporary boost of strength as he flexes his muscles. Finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, is accompanied by a refreshing wave of water, symbolizing the rejuvenation it provides.

Now, let's take a moment to delve into the story of Dr. Mundo and his place in the League of Legends universe. Dr. Mundo, originally known as Dr. Mondo, was once a brilliant scientist working in the underground laboratories of Zaun. Obsessed with finding a cure for all ailments, he conducted countless experiments on himself, pushing the boundaries of sanity and morality.

As his experiments grew more extreme, Dr. Mondo's mind began to unravel, and he transformed into the deranged Madman of Zaun we know today. With his newfound strength and resilience, he became a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. Dr. Mundo's abilities allow him to regenerate health rapidly, making him a formidable tank and a nuisance to his enemies.

Despite his chaotic nature, Dr. Mundo has found his place in the League of Legends. He serves as a reminder that even the most unconventional champions can find their purpose and contribute to the ongoing battles. His unpredictable nature and unyielding determination make him a unique addition to any team composition.

If you're interested in exploring more about Dr. Mundo and his various appearances in the League of Legends, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Whether it's his Pool Party Mundo skin or his classic Madman of Zaun look, Dr. Mundo is always ready to bring chaos and madness to the Rift.

Dr. Mundo (Street Demons Dr. Mundo)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 2021

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his eccentric personality and unconventional methods. With his latest skin, Street Demons Dr. Mundo, he takes on a whole new look that perfectly embodies his chaotic nature. This skin, released in November 2021, offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

Street Demons Dr. Mundo transforms the Madman of Zaun into a gritty and menacing figure, ready to roam the streets of Runeterra. Clad in a tattered leather jacket adorned with spikes and chains, Mundo exudes a punk-rock vibe that is both intimidating and captivating. His signature cleaver is replaced with a wicked-looking chain whip, adding a new level of brutality to his attacks.

The skin's visual effects are equally impressive. Mundo's abilities are enhanced with a dark and fiery aesthetic, showcasing the destructive power he possesses. The chain whip crackles with energy as it lashes out at enemies, leaving a trail of sparks in its wake. The sound effects have also been revamped to match the skin's theme, immersing players in the chaotic atmosphere of the streets.

Street Demons Dr. Mundo is a skin that truly captures the essence of the champion. It embraces his madness and amplifies it, creating a visually stunning and thematically cohesive experience for players. Whether you're a fan of Dr. Mundo or simply enjoy unique and edgy skins, Street Demons Dr. Mundo is a must-have addition to your collection.

The Madman of Zaun

Dr. Mundo, also known as the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. He is a hulking brute with a twisted mind, driven by his insatiable desire to experiment on himself and others. Mundo's origins are shrouded in mystery, but it is believed that he was once a brilliant scientist who lost his sanity in the pursuit of forbidden knowledge.

In the game, Dr. Mundo is classified as a tank and excels at soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. His abilities revolve around his durability and regeneration, making him a formidable force on the battlefield. Mundo's ultimate ability, Sadism, allows him to rapidly regenerate health, making him nearly unkillable in extended fights.

Despite his immense strength, Dr. Mundo has his weaknesses. He lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to champions who can kite or disable him. Additionally, his reliance on health regeneration means that he can be countered by champions who have strong burst damage or healing reduction abilities.

Over the years, Dr. Mundo has become a staple pick in the top lane, where his tankiness and sustain make him a formidable opponent. His unique playstyle and eccentric personality have endeared him to many players, making him a fan-favorite champion in the League of Legends community.

On this page, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Dr. Mundo's appearances, including the newly released Street Demons Dr. Mundo skin. Whether you're a seasoned Mundo player or just curious about this eccentric champion, this page is your go-to resource for all things Dr. Mundo.

Dr. Mundo (Mundo Mundo)

Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: November 15, 2010

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his eccentric personality and his unique appearance. Among his many skins, one stands out as particularly bizarre and comical - Mundo Mundo. This skin transforms Dr. Mundo into a living representation of himself, with his face plastered all over his body. It is a skin that adds a touch of humor to the game, making it a favorite among players who enjoy a good laugh.

Mundo Mundo was released on November 15, 2010, and has since become a popular choice for Dr. Mundo enthusiasts. Priced at 1350 RP, this skin offers a unique and entertaining experience for players who want to stand out on the battlefield.

The Story of Mundo Mundo

The Mundo Mundo skin takes the already eccentric character of Dr. Mundo to a whole new level. With his face plastered all over his body, this skin is a testament to Dr. Mundo's madness and his obsession with himself. It is as if he has become a walking advertisement for his own brand.

The skin features Dr. Mundo wearing a white lab coat, with his face repeated all over it. His head is also adorned with a large, grinning mask of himself. The rest of his body is covered in bandages, giving him a somewhat mummified appearance. The skin's splash art showcases Dr. Mundo holding a giant syringe, further emphasizing his mad scientist persona.

Mundo Mundo is a skin that perfectly captures the essence of Dr. Mundo's character. It highlights his self-obsession and his disregard for conventional norms. It is a skin that is both humorous and unsettling, making it a unique addition to the League of Legends universe.

Dr. Mundo: The Madman of Zaun

Dr. Mundo, also known as the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. He is a melee tank who excels at soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. With his high health pool and regenerative abilities, Dr. Mundo is a formidable force on the battlefield.

In the game, Dr. Mundo's abilities revolve around his insane durability and his ability to regenerate health. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a percentage of his maximum health over time. This makes him incredibly difficult to kill, as he can quickly recover from even the most devastating blows.

Dr. Mundo's Q ability, Infected Cleaver, allows him to throw a cleaver at his enemies, dealing damage and slowing them down. This ability is particularly useful for chasing down fleeing enemies or for initiating team fights. His W ability, Burning Agony, creates a persistent area of effect around him, dealing damage to nearby enemies and reducing the effectiveness of crowd control effects on him.

His E ability, Masochism, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage based on his missing health. This ability allows Dr. Mundo to deal significant damage to his enemies, especially when he is low on health. Finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, instantly restores a large portion of his health and increases his movement speed for a short duration. This ability can turn the tide of a battle, allowing Dr. Mundo to sustain through heavy damage and escape dangerous situations.

Dr. Mundo's unique playstyle and his tankiness make him a popular choice for players who enjoy soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. His ability to regenerate health and his high durability make him a difficult champion to deal with, especially in prolonged team fights.

Dr. Mundo's Place in the Game

Dr. Mundo has been a part of the League of Legends roster since the game's early days. He is a champion that has stood the test of time, remaining relevant and popular among players. His unique playstyle and his eccentric personality make him a fan favorite.

In the game, Dr. Mundo is often played in the top lane or in the jungle. His ability to sustain through damage and his high health pool make him a strong laner, capable of surviving even the toughest matchups. In the jungle, his fast clear speed and his ability to regenerate health make him a formidable presence.

Dr. Mundo's strengths lie in his durability and his ability to regenerate health. He can soak up damage and sustain through fights, making him a difficult champion to kill. However, he lacks crowd control abilities and relies heavily on his team to provide the necessary damage to secure kills. Additionally, he can be kited easily due to his lack of mobility.

Despite his weaknesses, Dr. Mundo remains a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His unique playstyle and his entertaining personality make him a joy to play, and his ability to soak up damage and disrupt the enemy team make him a valuable asset in team fights.

Explore Dr. Mundo's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Dr. Mundo and explore his various appearances in the game, you can find information and videos on his dedicated page on the League of Legends website. From his classic appearance to his various skins, including the eccentric Mundo Mundo, there is plenty to discover about this madman from Zaun.

Whether you're a fan of his unique playstyle or simply enjoy his eccentric personality, Dr. Mundo is a champion that has left a lasting impression on the League of Legends community. So don't miss out on the opportunity to delve into his world and experience the madness for yourself!

Dr. Mundo (Rageborn Mundo)

RP Cost: 975 RP

Release Date: November 29, 2011

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. Known for his insane personality and unbreakable will, Dr. Mundo has become a fan-favorite character. With a wide range of skins available, one of the most notable and iconic ones is Rageborn Mundo. This article will delve into the story behind this skin and provide a detailed overview of its features.

Rageborn Mundo is a legendary skin that was released on November 29, 2011. Priced at 975 RP, this skin offers players a unique and visually striking appearance for Dr. Mundo. With its fiery theme and menacing design, Rageborn Mundo stands out on the battlefield, making it a popular choice among players.

The Story of Rageborn Mundo

Rageborn Mundo is a skin that showcases Dr. Mundo's transformation into a creature fueled by pure rage and fury. In this alternate universe, Dr. Mundo has succumbed to the dark forces that reside within him, embracing his inner madness and unleashing it upon his enemies.

The skin features Dr. Mundo adorned in fiery armor, with flames emanating from his body. His cleaver, normally a simple surgical tool, has been transformed into a wicked weapon engulfed in flames. As he moves, the ground beneath him cracks and burns, leaving a trail of destruction in his wake.

With Rageborn Mundo, players can experience the thrill of playing as a truly unstoppable force. The skin's vibrant colors and menacing effects add a new level of intensity to Dr. Mundo's gameplay, making it a must-have for fans of the champion.

Dr. Mundo: The Madman of Zaun

Dr. Mundo, also known as the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in League of Legends. He is a hulking brute with a seemingly indestructible body and a mind consumed by madness. Driven by his insatiable desire to experiment on himself, he has become a grotesque and unstoppable force on the battlefield.

Dr. Mundo's abilities make him a formidable opponent. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a percentage of his maximum health over time, making him incredibly difficult to kill. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, hurls a cleaver at his enemies, dealing damage and slowing them down. His W ability, Burning Agony, sets himself on fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies and reducing the duration of crowd control effects. His E ability, Masochism, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage based on his missing health. Finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, instantly restores a large portion of his health and increases his movement speed for a short duration.

Dr. Mundo's playstyle revolves around his incredible durability and sustain. He can soak up damage like no other champion, making him an excellent frontline tank. His ability to regenerate health allows him to stay in fights for extended periods, wearing down his opponents with his relentless pursuit.

In the lore of League of Legends, Dr. Mundo is a deranged scientist from the city of Zaun. Experimenting on himself with dangerous and volatile substances, he has transformed into a monstrous being. His mind has deteriorated, leaving him with a single-minded obsession for pain and suffering. Dr. Mundo's presence in the game adds a touch of madness and unpredictability, making him a unique and memorable character.

Explore Dr. Mundo's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Dr. Mundo and his various appearances in League of Legends, you've come to the right place. On this page, you can find information, images, and videos showcasing all of Dr. Mundo's skins, including the iconic Rageborn Mundo. Whether you're a fan of his classic look or prefer the fiery fury of Rageborn Mundo, there's something here for everyone.

So, dive into the world of Dr. Mundo and discover the madness that awaits. Whether you choose to embrace the rage with Rageborn Mundo or explore his other skins, Dr. Mundo is sure to leave a lasting impression on the battlefield.

Dr. Mundo (TPA Mundo)

Cost: 750 RP | Release Date: May 24, 2013

Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is known for his insane experiments and his unbreakable will. TPA Mundo transforms Dr. Mundo into a member of the Taipei Assassins, complete with their iconic black and red team colors. This skin features a new model for Dr. Mundo, giving him a sleeker and more modern appearance. He wears the TPA team jersey, with the team logo prominently displayed on his chest. His cleaver, which he uses as his primary weapon, is also given a TPA makeover, with the team logo engraved on the blade.

Not only does TPA Mundo change Dr. Mundo's appearance, but it also brings new visual effects to his abilities. When he activates his W ability, Burning Agony, flames engulf him, with the TPA logo appearing in the center. Dr. Mundo, the champion behind the TPA Mundo skin, has a fascinating story within the world of League of Legends. He is a deranged and unpredictable character from the city of Zaun, a place known for its dark experiments and twisted science. Dr. Mundo himself is a result of these experiments, having undergone numerous procedures that have left him physically and mentally unstable.

In the game, Dr. Mundo is a tanky champion who excels at soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a portion of his maximum health over time, making him incredibly difficult to kill. His Q ability, Infected Cleaver, is a skillshot that deals damage and slows the target hit, making it a great tool for chasing down enemies or escaping sticky situations.

Dr. Mundo's W ability, Burning Agony, is an area-of-effect ability that deals damage to nearby enemies and reduces the duration of crowd control effects on him. This ability can be activated to deal continuous damage to enemies around him while also increasing his own movement speed. It's a powerful tool for diving into the enemy team and causing chaos.

His E ability, Masochism, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage based on his missing health. This ability allows Dr. Mundo to become a formidable threat in the late game, as his health pool increases and his damage potential skyrockets. Finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, allows him to instantly regenerate a large portion of his missing health, making him incredibly difficult to take down in team fights.

Dr. Mundo's unique playstyle and his ability to sustain through immense amounts of damage make him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His TPA Mundo skin adds a touch of style and flair to his already eccentric personality, allowing players to show their support for the Taipei Assassins while wreaking havoc on the Rift.

Now, let's delve into the story of Dr. Mundo himself. Dr. Mundo, also known as Dr. Mundo, the Madman of Zaun, is a champion in the popular online game League of Legends. He is a melee tank champion who excels at soaking up damage and disrupting the enemy team. Dr. Mundo's unique abilities and playstyle make him a formidable force on the battlefield.

Dr. Mundo's past is shrouded in mystery. He is believed to have been a brilliant scientist who worked in the laboratories of Zaun, a city known for its technological advancements and experimentation. However, something went terribly wrong, and Dr. Mundo's mind snapped, driving him to madness. Now, he roams the streets of Zaun, wreaking havoc and causing chaos wherever he goes.

In the game, Dr. Mundo is known for his incredible durability and regenerative abilities. His passive ability, Adrenaline Rush, allows him to regenerate a percentage of his maximum health over time, making him incredibly difficult to kill. Combined with his ultimate ability, Sadism, which instantly restores a large portion of his health, Dr. Mundo can sustain himself in fights for extended periods.

Dr. Mundo's Q ability, Infected Cleaver, is a skillshot that deals damage and slows the enemy hit. It's a versatile ability that can be used to poke enemies from a distance or to chase down fleeing opponents. His W ability, Burning Agony, creates an area of effect around him, dealing damage to nearby enemies and reducing the duration of crowd control effects. This ability allows Dr. Mundo to disrupt the enemy team and soak up damage in team fights.

Dr. Mundo's E ability, Masochism, empowers his next basic attack, dealing bonus damage based on his missing health. Finally, his ultimate ability, Sadism, instantly restores a large portion of his health and increases his movement speed for a short duration. Dr. Mundo's unique playstyle and abilities make him a popular pick in both casual and competitive play. His durability and sustain allow him to survive in team fights and soak up damage, while his disruptive abilities make him a nuisance to deal with. However, Dr. Mundo does have his weaknesses. He lacks crowd control abilities, making him vulnerable to kiting and crowd control-heavy compositions. Additionally, his damage output is relatively low compared to other champions, making him reliant on his team to secure kills.
